trans-unit.source: Processing

seg-source.mrk: Processing

trans-unit.source: This section explains how and where verifications are processed.

seg-source.mrk: This section explains how and where verifications are processed.

trans-unit.source: Verify Lines

seg-source.mrk: Verify Lines

trans-unit.source: Besides the protection of critical master data, the cc|regulatory affairs module enables the protection of all critical business processes by selectively assigning password and documentation duties.

seg-source.mrk: Besides the protection of critical master data, the cc|regulatory affairs module enables the protection of all critical business processes by selectively assigning password and documentation duties.

trans-unit.source: The verification of transaction data occurs exclusively in the Verify Lines page, which is accessed from the cc|regulatory affairs menu by clicking Verification > Verify Lines (or Tasks > Verify Lines).

seg-source.mrk: The verification of transaction data occurs exclusively in the Verify Lines page, which is accessed from the cc|regulatory affairs menu by clicking Verification > Verify Lines (or Tasks > Verify Lines).

trans-unit.source: : Verify Lines page

seg-source.mrk: : Verify Lines page

trans-unit.source: In the General section, users can filter the table according to different areas or the Created by user. Depending on the setup, an entry in the following fields may be required:

seg-source.mrk: In the General section, users can filter the table according to different areas or the Created by user.
Depending on the setup, an entry in the following fields may be required:

trans-unit.source: Verify Value

seg-source.mrk: Verify Value

trans-unit.source: Verify Value 2

seg-source.mrk: Verify Value 2

trans-unit.source: Verific. Description

seg-source.mrk: Verific.
Description

trans-unit.source: Verific. Description 2

seg-source.mrk: Verific.
Description 2

trans-unit.source: After entering the verification value – and verification description, if required – in the line, click Verify on the ribbon to open the Login page, where the user ID and password is entered to complete the verification process. Completely verified lines are removed from the Verify Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: After entering the verification value – and verification description, if required – in the line, click Verify on the ribbon to open the Login page, where the user ID and password is entered to complete the verification process.
Completely verified lines are removed from the Verify Lines page.

trans-unit.source: If second user verification is required, the line in the Verify Lines page for the first user will become non-editable and grayed out but the Verify Value 2 and Verific. Description 2 fields remain editable for all other authorized users. Refer to topic "Four-Eyes Principle" on page 1 for more information about second user verification.

seg-source.mrk: If second user verification is required, the line in the Verify Lines page for the first user will become non-editable and grayed out but the Verify Value 2 and Verific.
Description 2 fields remain editable for all other authorized users.

Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref421543573" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Four-Eyes Principle" on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information about second user verification.

trans-unit.source: If any verified data is changed (on the originating document, journal, etc.), the verification must be executed again.

seg-source.mrk: If any verified data is changed (on the originating document, journal, etc.), the verification must be executed again.

trans-unit.source: Verification of Master Data

seg-source.mrk: Verification of Master Data

trans-unit.source: This type of verification can be processed for the following master data records:

seg-source.mrk: This type of verification can be processed for the following master data records:

trans-unit.source: Production BOM

seg-source.mrk: Production BOM

trans-unit.source: Routing

seg-source.mrk: Routing

trans-unit.source: If the verification has been activated for the above master data, a modification of the status of a record (New, Certified, Under Development, or Closed) must be verified by the user.

seg-source.mrk: If the verification has been activated for the above master data, a modification of the status of a record (New, Certified, Under Development, or Closed) must be verified by the user.

trans-unit.source: Based on the settings in the Verification Setup page, the user must enter his or her password, a description (= reason for modification) or the User ID and password of a different user (= approval by different user).

seg-source.mrk: Based on the settings in the Verification Setup page, the user must enter his or her password, a description (= reason for modification) or the User ID and password of a different user (= approval by different user).

trans-unit.source: : Password and description verification required to certify the Production BOM

seg-source.mrk: : Password and description verification required to certify the Production BOM

trans-unit.source: After verification, the status of the according document is changed automatically.

seg-source.mrk: After verification, the status of the according document is changed automatically.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: An additional Verification Comment can be added to the Verification Entry authorization by clicking Navigate > Comment.

seg-source.mrk: An additional Verification Comment can be added to the Verification Entry authorization by clicking Navigate > Comment.

trans-unit.source: Verification Entries

seg-source.mrk: Verification Entries

trans-unit.source: Processed master data verification entries can be viewed in the Verification Entries page, accessible on the cc|regulatory affairs menu by clicking Verification > Verification Entries (or Lists > Verification Entries).

seg-source.mrk: Processed master data verification entries can be viewed in the Verification Entries page, accessible on the cc|regulatory affairs menu by clicking Verification > Verification Entries (or Lists > Verification Entries).

trans-unit.source: : Processed verification entries

seg-source.mrk: : Processed verification entries

trans-unit.source: Verification Entries for specific master data lines (including production order components and routings) can be accessed by clicking Verific. Entries on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: Verification Entries for specific master data lines (including production order components and routings) can be accessed by clicking <span class="Bold">Verific.
Entries on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: : Processed verification entries for changes to the COSM-001 Production BOM

seg-source.mrk: : Processed verification entries for changes to the COSM-001 Production BOM

trans-unit.source: Four-Eyes Principle

seg-source.mrk: Four-Eyes Principle

trans-unit.source: cc|regulatory affairs requires two authorized users to execute verification processes if the different user verification (option +Diff. User) has been selected in the Verification Setup. Therefore, the system saves the information of the first user who verifies the process or action and then demands that a different user also verify the process or action.

seg-source.mrk: cc|regulatory affairs requires two authorized users to execute verification processes if the different user verification (option +Diff.
User) has been selected in the Verification Setup.
Therefore, the system saves the information of the first user who verifies the process or action and then demands that a different user also verify the process or action.

trans-unit.source: The verification process is handled differently in each verification page:

seg-source.mrk: The verification process is handled differently in each verification page:

trans-unit.source:
Verify Lines – Two verification value and description fields exist and the Diff. User Required check box is selected on lines that require double user verification.
  • The first user enters the value and description in the Verify Value and Verific. Description fields.
  • The second user can edit the Verify Value 2 and Verific. Description 2 fields.
    The line is not grayed out for the second user if logged into his/her account. Once verification is complete, the line is removed from the Verify Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: Verify Lines – Two verification value and description fields exist and the <span class="Bold">Diff.
User Required check box is selected on lines that require double user verification.
• The first user enters the value and description in the Verify Value and Verific.
Description fields.
• The second user can edit the Verify Value 2 and Verific.
Description 2 fields.
The line is not grayed out for the second user if logged into his/her account.
Once verification is complete, the line is removed from the Verify Lines page.

trans-unit.source:
Verification Entry – Opens twice for user verification.
  • The first user enters his/her password and description.
  • A message appears that a second user is required to complete verification.
  • The page re-opens for the second user to enter his/her password and description.

seg-source.mrk: Verification Entry – Opens twice for user verification.
<li>The first user enters his/her password and description.
<li>A message appears that a second user is required to complete verification.
• The page re-opens for the second user to enter his/her password and description.

trans-unit.source: Once the double user verification is completed, the user can continue with the process or action.

seg-source.mrk: Once the double user verification is completed, the user can continue with the process or action.

trans-unit.source: Exercise – Process a Manufactured Item with Verifications

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – Process a Manufactured Item with Verifications

trans-unit.source: Item Q-40006, Shower Gel Bulk, is ready to be sold to customers directly. The net weight for this item’s test plan needs to be changed from an upper limit of 205 ML to 204 ML, which requires a different user and documentation verification.

seg-source.mrk: Item Q-40006, Shower Gel Bulk, is ready to be sold to customers directly.
The net weight for this item’s test plan needs to be changed from an upper limit of 205 ML to 204 ML, which requires a different user and documentation verification.

trans-unit.source: Some raw materials need to be purchased from vendor V00020, which requires password verification and then 500 units of item Q-40006 need to be produced, which requires password and documentation verification on output.

seg-source.mrk: Some raw materials need to be purchased from vendor V00020, which requires password verification and then 500 units of item Q-40006 need to be produced, which requires password and documentation verification on output.

trans-unit.source: After a Test Order is created, the lot needs to be released, which requires password and documentation verification.

seg-source.mrk: After a Test Order is created, the lot needs to be released, which requires password and documentation verification.

trans-unit.source: The final step is to ship 50 units of this lot to customer 49858585, which requires password verification.

seg-source.mrk: The final step is to ship 50 units of this lot to customer 49858585, which requires password verification.

trans-unit.source: Important

seg-source.mrk: Important

trans-unit.source: Prior to starting this exercise, delete any Retain Sample Instructions for Item Category Code = SEMI or Item No. Q-40006 (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Retain Sample Instructions.htm" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Retain Sample Instructions" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Prior to starting this exercise, delete any Retain Sample Instructions for Item Category Code = SEMI or Item No.

Q-40006 (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Retain Sample Instructions.htm" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Retain Sample Instructions" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Modify the Test Plan and Assign to Item

seg-source.mrk: Modify the Test Plan and Assign to Item

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to modify a test plan and assign to item Q-40006:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to modify a test plan and assign to item Q-40006:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click cc|quality management > cc|quality management > Test Plans.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click cc|quality management > cc|quality management > Test Plans.

trans-unit.source: Locate test plan TP00005 and open the Test Plan Card.

seg-source.mrk: Locate test plan TP00005 and open the Test Plan Card.

trans-unit.source: Change the Status to Under Development.

seg-source.mrk: Change the Status to Under Development.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, select the first line for Final Inspection and then click Property Set > Card.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, select the first line for Final Inspection and then click Property Set > Card.

trans-unit.source: For Test Property Code TP00001, change the value in the Upper Limit field to 204.

seg-source.mrk: For Test Property Code TP00001, change the value in the Upper Limit field to 204.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Test Plan Prop. Set Card page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Test Plan Prop.
Set Card page.

trans-unit.source:
Certify the Test Plan.
The Verification Entry page opens.

seg-source.mrk: Certify the Test Plan.
The Verification Entry page opens.

trans-unit.source: : Verification Entry

seg-source.mrk: : Verification Entry

trans-unit.source: In the User ID field, click the arrow and select NT.

seg-source.mrk: In the User ID field, click the arrow and select NT.

trans-unit.source: In the Password field, type 12S4%.

seg-source.mrk: In the Password field, type 12S4%.

trans-unit.source:
Click OK (or press CTRL+ENTER) to close the page without entering a description.
A message appears stating that the Description must have a value.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK (or press CTRL+ENTER) to close the page without entering a description.
A message appears stating that the Description must have a value.

trans-unit.source: : Message received when a required description is not entered with the verification

seg-source.mrk: : Message received when a required description is not entered with the verification

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the verification description message.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the verification description message.

trans-unit.source: In the Description field, type “Change net weight upper limit”.

seg-source.mrk: In the Description field, type “Change net weight upper limit”.

trans-unit.source:
Click OK.
A message appears stating that a second user is required to complete the verification.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.
A message appears stating that a second user is required to complete the verification.

trans-unit.source: : Different user verification requirement to certify the test plan

seg-source.mrk: : Different user verification requirement to certify the test plan

trans-unit.source:
Click OK to close the second user verification message.
The Verification Entry page reopens for the second user verification.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the second user verification message.
The Verification Entry page reopens for the second user verification.

trans-unit.source: In the User ID field, click the arrow and select the OSCAR (blocked) user.

seg-source.mrk: In the User ID field, click the arrow and select the OSCAR (blocked) user.

trans-unit.source:
Press ENTER or TAB.
A message appears stating that the user must not be Blocked.

seg-source.mrk: Press ENTER or TAB.
A message appears stating that the user must not be Blocked.

trans-unit.source: : Message received for entering a blocked user ID

seg-source.mrk: : Message received for entering a blocked user ID

trans-unit.source: In the User ID field, click the arrow and select the EMIL user.

seg-source.mrk: In the User ID field, click the arrow and select the EMIL user.

trans-unit.source: In the Password field, type @bCD3.

seg-source.mrk: In the Password field, type @bCD3.

trans-unit.source: In the Description field, type “Change net weight upper limit”.

seg-source.mrk: In the Description field, type “Change net weight upper limit”.

trans-unit.source: : Verification User ID, Password and Description provided to certify the Test Plan

seg-source.mrk: : Verification User ID, Password and Description provided to certify the Test Plan

trans-unit.source:
Click OK.
The Test Plan is certified.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.
The Test Plan is certified.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Test Plan Card page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Test Plan Card page.

Click OK.

trans-unit.source: Click Verify on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: Click Verify on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: In the User ID field, type EMIL.

seg-source.mrk: In the User ID field, type EMIL.

trans-unit.source: In the Password field, type @bCD3.

seg-source.mrk: In the Password field, type @bCD3.

trans-unit.source: Click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.

trans-unit.source: Repeat steps 31-35 for the remaining output lines.

seg-source.mrk: Repeat steps 31-35 for the remaining output lines.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Verify Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Verify Lines page.

trans-unit.source: Open the Output Journal page.

seg-source.mrk: Open the Output Journal page.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the Finished check box is still selected on the last line and then click Post on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: Ensure that the Finished check box is still selected on the last line and then click Post on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to post the journal lines.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to post the journal lines.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the posting confirmation message.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the posting confirmation message.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Output Journal page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Output Journal page.

trans-unit.source: Create and Process the Test Order

seg-source.mrk: Create and Process the Test Order

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create and process the test order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create and process the test order:

trans-unit.source: Login as NT.

seg-source.mrk: Login as NT.

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click Manufacturing > Execution > Released Prod. Orders.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click <span class="Bold">Manufacturing > Execution > Released Prod.
Orders.

trans-unit.source: Open the production order created in the “Create the Production Order” procedure.

seg-source.mrk: Open the production order created in the “Create the Production Order” procedure.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Create Test Order.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Create Test Order.

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to create the test order for item Q-40006, LOT5000.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to create the test order for item Q-40006, LOT5000.

trans-unit.source: Close the Released Production Order page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Released Production Order page.

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click cc|quality management > cc|quality management > Test Orders/Value Recording.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click cc|quality management > cc|quality management > Test Orders/Value Recording.

trans-unit.source: Open the Test Order for Q-40006, LOT5000.

seg-source.mrk: Open the Test Order for Q-40006, LOT5000.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Release.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Release.

trans-unit.source: On the first line, type 201 in the Determined Value field.

seg-source.mrk: On the first line, type 201 in the Determined Value field.

trans-unit.source: On the second line, enter OK in the Determined Value field.

seg-source.mrk: On the second line, enter OK in the Determined Value field.

trans-unit.source:
On the third line, enter OK in the Determined Value field and then press ENTER.
A message appears stating that testing is finished.

seg-source.mrk: On the third line, enter OK in the Determined Value field and then press ENTER.
A message appears stating that testing is finished.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the message.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the message.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Finish.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Finish.

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to close the test order.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to close the test order.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Test Order/Value Recording Card page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Test Order/Value Recording Card page.

trans-unit.source: Change the Lot Status

seg-source.mrk: Change the Lot Status

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to change the lot status:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to change the lot status:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, under cc|quality management, click cc|quality management > Lot-/Serial No. Administration.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, under cc|quality management, click cc|quality management > Lot-/Serial No.
Administration.

trans-unit.source: In the Lot Filter field, type LOT5000.

seg-source.mrk: In the Lot Filter field, type LOT5000.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Get Records.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Get Records.

trans-unit.source: In the Quantity field, type 500.

seg-source.mrk: In the Quantity field, type 500.

trans-unit.source: In the New Status field, enter RELEASED.

seg-source.mrk: In the New Status field, enter RELEASED.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source:
Click Yes to post the changes.
A message appears stating that the line is not verified.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to post the changes.
A message appears stating that the line is not verified.

trans-unit.source: : Verification requirement message to post the lot status change

seg-source.mrk: : Verification requirement message to post the lot status change

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close message.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close message.

trans-unit.source:
Click Navigate > Verify to open the Verify Lines page.
Note that the lot administration line exists with the Verify Value field populated with the changed value (New Status) and the Description Required check box selected because documentation verification is required.

seg-source.mrk: Click Navigate > Verify to open the Verify Lines page.

Note that the lot administration line exists with the Verify Value field populated with the changed value (New Status) and the Description Required check box selected because documentation verification is required.

trans-unit.source: : Verify Lines for posting lot status change

seg-source.mrk: : Verify Lines for posting lot status change

trans-unit.source:
Click Verify on the ribbon without entering a description.
A message appears that the Verific. Description must have a value.

seg-source.mrk: Click Verify on the ribbon without entering a description.
A message appears that the <span class="Bold">Verific.
Description must have a value.

trans-unit.source: : Message received when a required description is not entered with the verification

seg-source.mrk: : Message received when a required description is not entered with the verification

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the message.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the message.

trans-unit.source: In the Verific. Description field, type “Items tested OK”.

seg-source.mrk: In the <span class="Bold">Verific.
Description field, type “Items tested OK”.

trans-unit.source:
Click Verify on the ribbon.
The Login page opens.

seg-source.mrk: Click Verify on the ribbon.
The Login page opens.

trans-unit.source: : Login (password check and documentation) requirement on the Verify Lines page

seg-source.mrk: : Login (password check and documentation) requirement on the Verify Lines page

trans-unit.source: In the User ID field, enter NT.

seg-source.mrk: In the User ID field, enter NT.

trans-unit.source: In the Password field, type 12S4%.

seg-source.mrk: In the Password field, type 12S4%.

trans-unit.source: Click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Verify Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Verify Lines page.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Home > Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Home > Post.

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to post the change; click No to add a comment; and then click OK to close the posting confirmation message.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to post the change; click No to add a comment; and then click OK to close the posting confirmation message.

trans-unit.source: : Lot released

seg-source.mrk: : Lot released

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Lot-/Serial No. Administration page; click Yes to continue closing the page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Lot-/Serial No.
Administration page; click Yes to continue closing the page.

trans-unit.source: Create the Sales Order and Post the Shipment

seg-source.mrk: Create the Sales Order and Post the Shipment

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create the sales order and post the shipment:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create the sales order and post the shipment:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click Sales & Marketing > Order Processing > Sales Orders.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click Sales & Marketing > Order Processing > Sales Orders.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER to automatically populate the No. field.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER to automatically populate the No.
field.

trans-unit.source: In the Sell-to Customer No. field, enter 49858585.

seg-source.mrk: In the Sell-to Customer No.
field, enter 49858585.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, enter Item in the Type field.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, enter Item in the Type field.

trans-unit.source: In the No. field, enter Q-40006.

seg-source.mrk: In the No.
field, enter Q-40006.

trans-unit.source: In the Location Code field, enter MAINWH.

seg-source.mrk: In the Location Code field, enter MAINWH.

trans-unit.source: In the Quantity field, type 50.

seg-source.mrk: In the Quantity field, type 50.

trans-unit.source: Open Item Tracking and assign LOT5000.

seg-source.mrk: Open Item Tracking and assign LOT5000.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source:
Select the Ship option and then click OK.
A message appears stating that the line is not verified

seg-source.mrk: Select the Ship option and then click OK.
A message appears stating that the line is not verified

trans-unit.source: : Verification requirement message to post the Sales Order

seg-source.mrk: : Verification requirement message to post the Sales Order

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the message.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the message.

trans-unit.source: Minimize the Sales Order.

seg-source.mrk: Minimize the Sales Order.

trans-unit.source:
In the navigation pane, click cc|regulatory affairs > Verification > Verify Lines.
The Verify Lines page opens without the Description Required check box selected because documentation verification is not required.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click cc|regulatory affairs > Verification > Verify Lines.
The Verify Lines page opens without the Description Required check box selected because documentation verification is not required.

trans-unit.source: On the order line, type 50 in the Verify Value field.

seg-source.mrk: On the order line, type 50 in the Verify Value field.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Verify.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Verify.

trans-unit.source: In the User ID field, enter NT.

seg-source.mrk: In the User ID field, enter NT.

trans-unit.source: In the Password field, type 12S4%X (an invalid password).

seg-source.mrk: In the Password field, type 12S4%X (an invalid password).

trans-unit.source: Click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.

trans-unit.source: : Message received when the wrong password is entered

seg-source.mrk: : Message received when the wrong password is entered

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the password message.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the password message.

trans-unit.source: NOTE

seg-source.mrk: NOTE

trans-unit.source: If the wrong password is entered two more times (three consecutive incorrect passwords), the user will be blocked. This is based on the Max. Qty. Failed Logins setting of 3 in the "Set Up Verifications and Password Policies" exercise.

seg-source.mrk: If the wrong password is entered two more times (three consecutive incorrect passwords), the user will be blocked.
This is based on the <span class="Bold">Max.
Qty.
Failed Logins setting of 3 in the "Set Up Verifications and Password Policies" exercise.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Verify.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Verify.

trans-unit.source: In the User ID field, enter NT.

seg-source.mrk: In the User ID field, enter NT.

trans-unit.source: In the Password field, type 12S4%.

seg-source.mrk: In the Password field, type 12S4%.

trans-unit.source:
Click OK.
The verification is accepted and the line is removed from the Verify Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.
The verification is accepted and the line is removed from the Verify Lines page.

trans-unit.source: NOTE

seg-source.mrk: NOTE

trans-unit.source: If double user verification had been required, the Diff. User Required check box would have been selected on the line and another user would have needed to verify the line before posting the sales order. Refer to topics "Verify Lines" on page 1 and "Four-Eyes Principle" on page 1 for more information.

seg-source.mrk: If double user verification had been required, the <span class="Bold">Diff.
User Required check box would have been selected on the line and another user would have needed to verify the line before posting the sales order.

Refer to topics <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref353289982" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Verify Lines" on page 1</MadCap:xref> and <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref421543573" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Four-Eyes Principle" on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Verify Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Verify Lines page.

trans-unit.source: Maximize the Sales Order.

seg-source.mrk: Maximize the Sales Order.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source:
Select the Ship option and then click OK.
The sales order ships with no further verification requirements.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Ship option and then click OK.
The sales order ships with no further verification requirements.
